[edit]

Type classes

A type class is a type system construct that supports ad hoc polymorphism. This is achieved by adding constraints to type variables in parametrically polymorphic types. 1

Type class instances allow us to add behaviour to types without changing the types themselves.

Footnotes

1 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Type_class
